sentences.en: Actually, we've got a freight forwarder over there - China Consolidated.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 我们这边自己有货运公司 -- 中国联合公司.

sentences.en: Can your agent accept payment from our freight forwarder?
sentences.cn: 你们代理能否接受我们货代公司直接付款给他们.

sentences.en: Forwarder management: Manage relationship with various forwarders, ensure cost and punctual delivery.
sentences.cn: 货代管理: 管理不同货代, 确保经济、准时的运输.

sentences.en: GBC is a Freight forwarder specialized in Landbridge multimodal transportation.
sentences.cn: GBC是一家专业从事欧亚大陆多式联运的物流服务商.

sentences.en: Harold: Actually, we have a freight forwarder over there -- China Consolidated.
sentences.cn: 哈洛德: 事实上, 我们自己在那边有一家货运公司─ ─ 叫做中国联合.

sentences.en: In China, TGL a coveted A forwarder's license.
sentences.cn: 会通华联集团在中国大陆地区拥有一级货运代理执照.

sentences.en: It's configured to perform recursion or use a forwarder.
sentences.cn: 它被配置来执行递归或者使用转发器.

sentences.en: Kevin: Actually, we've got a freight forwarder over there - China Consolidated.
sentences.cn: 凯文: 事实上, 我们这边自己有货运公司 -- 中国联合公司.

sentences.en: Loading the packed goods on the forwarder truck without accident.
sentences.cn: 将已包装好的货物安全地装上运输公司的卡车.

sentences.en: Minimum of 3 years experience in freight forwarder.
sentences.cn: 3年以上之海运客户服务工作经验.

sentences.en: Originally, a freight forwarder was a commission agent.
sentences.cn: 最初, 货代只是佣金代理.

sentences.en: Please advice forwarder for this shipment. so we can shipment in advanced.
sentences.cn: 请通知代理关于此次的货运. 这样我们可以优先订舱.

sentences.en: The payment receipt of forwarder expense ( a duplicate copy ) is inquried.
sentences.cn: 要求提供货代费用的付费收据 ( 副本即可 ).

sentences.en: You do not to pay the CFS chargesto the forwarder again.
sentences.cn: 您不需要在转发站的收费处支付.

sentences.en: Your independent shipping agent and forwarder in the port of Antwerp.
sentences.cn: 我们是安特卫普港独立的运输代理和货运商.

words.tran_cn: 运送者，促进者；传送装置

trans.tran_cn: 代运人，运输业者，转运公司，促进者
trans.tran_en: a person or thing that forwards
